verbose_text: Lee and co-workers [XREF_BIBR] have shown that the oleanolic acid glycosides caulosides A-D exert anti-inflammatory effects by way of inhibiting expression of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) and the pro inflammatory cytokines tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha) and interleukin 6 (IL-6).
evidence: expression of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS) and the pro-inflammatory cytokines tumor necrosis factor alpha (TNF-alpha) and interleukin 6 (IL-6
